Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 26th/Artesian
ShortDescription: Eastbound 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, California, Cermak and Western: due to, street blockage near 26th/Artesian.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, California, Cermak and Western: due to, street blockage near 26th/Artesian.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
